name: Bug Byte
description:
Bug Byte is a Shooter Platformer where you play as a computer bug that is on a journey to destroy the program it inhabits.

A and D are used for moving Left and Right. Space is used for Shooting. W is used for Jumping. If you press CTRL while Jumping you Glide.

Made By

Amanda Rowe - Art and Funni Beetle Shenanagins

Christian Sheherlis - UI and Submissive & Readable

Ender/Liza Escuadro - Design and Internal Screaming

John Haley (Mr.Fumpledump) - ProjectOrganization, Programming, and Slumberless Insanity

Zion Nelson - Music, Design, and a straight-up menace this dude really do be drinking a whole ass energy drink at 11 pm.
